item.description:
Let's plan to do a Walden Swim! We had a good turn out for the first meet up and I am excited to go from here. A group will meet up in the brookline/boston area to bike out to walden, and for those still sans bike carpools will be arranged, just let me know if you are in need of a ride out there and we can arrange where to meet up! I will map out the distances and as with the run try to form 2-3 groups for those who want a longer swim and for those who are having their first open water swim. For those that can stick around for a bit, I will try to set up some "swim starts" with groups starting close together to simulate an actual swim start with all the craziness that goes along.

For those of you brand new to the tri community this will be a great chance to experience some open water swimming in a friendly environment. (I sure wish I had at least practiced open water swimming before my first tri!)

I will update with more details soon. Please contact me if you have questions or check the site for updates.

Also as always, if you have suggestions for a meet up whether it be an actual training event or otherwise, let me know!
item.name: Walden Swim Sat 9/1
